channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech

item.title: China bans seafood from Japan after the Fukushima nuclear plant begins its wastewater release
item.description: Japan’s tsunami-wrecked nuclear power plant in Fukushima is releasing its first batch of treated radioactive water into the Pacific Ocean.
item.dc:creator: Mari Yamaguchi, Associated Press, KPRC 2
